page.title: 04INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: We have talked to 3 people who used to go to our school and they were all over{70 years old. { Miss Snowball's family}have lived in Belsay for 150 years and she used to walk to Belsay School with her brother { Mrs. Bowman and Mr. Wake}lived 3 miles away and they walked to school although they sometimes got a lift on the local farmer's milk cart. Mr. Wake could remember the boys carrying their boots and walking in bare feet to save shoe leather. Sometimes they rinsed their feet in the stream so that the tar wouldn't stick to.them. { Sir Arthur Middleton}built the school with very high ceilings because he liked the children to have plenty of fresh air and wanted them to breathe deeply.
